clues.text: In "The Tempest", Ferdinand plays this board game with Miranda, whom he plans to promote to queen

Kent trips Oswald & calls him a "base football player" for disrespecting this title royal, Goneril's father
In "Love's Labour's Lost", a character "plays at tables", an old term for this board game played with counters & dice
The main story line of a literary work, or the spot where you could be buried
The protective paper cover around a hardbound book is known as this type of "jacket"
Unrhymed poetry of irregular meter & rhythm is known by this 2-word term
Usually followed by the resolution or denouement, it's the decisive turning point of a dramatic story!
As its prefix indicates, this 7-letter word is the implied meaning "underneath" a literary work

"Vitruvian Man"

To misdirect one's energies is to do this "up the wrong tree"
Fill a hole tightly, or promote a product by mentioning it in the media
To dip a food item into liquid, such as a donut into milk
To flick the middle finger from the thumb tip to the base of the thumb, producing this sharp noise
As a noun, it's a building where grain is ground into flour; as a verb, it means to do the grinding
A pit boss, to Ned Flanders on this show: "Las Vegas doesn't care for out of towners! Take your money & go someplace else"
Teddy Roosevelt, to Larry the security guard in this movie: "Lawrence! Why are you slapping a monkey?"
Shifu to Po the Dragon Warrior, in this film: "we do not wash our pits in the Pool of Sacred Tears"
This Jon Heder character, when told he needs key chains: "I already made like infinity of those at scout camp"

In 1991 the Soviet Union ceased to exist after his Christmas Day resignation as president
On April 22, 1989 tens of thousands of students gathered in this square in China to demand democratic reform
On March 20, 1952 this country's supreme court declared voter segregation unconstitutional, but it continued

rounds.category: IT'S NOT A MESS, IT'S A COLLECTION

clues.text: Introduced in 1959, the first of these collectible dolls sported a ponytail & a zebra-striped bathing suit
You're not a loonie just because you collect loonies, shekels & other types of these

Chew on this: humans have 12 of these teeth with broad biting surfaces adapted for grinding

Per its label, the topical medicine Vicks VapoRub aims to suppress this cold symptom
This organ is shaped like a "J" & generally holds a little over 1 quart

Irons one's gowns & frocks

A Civil War soldier struggles to regain his nerve to fight in this 1895 novel
Want to know how it was for a European woman running an African coffee plantation in the 1920s? Read this 1937 book

Born in 1960, she's the newest justice & the youngest member of the Supreme Court

rounds.text: Forbes says Jennifer Lawrence was the highest-paid actress in 2016; this alliterative woman was second
